entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow near the Cariboo mountains. Amount 10 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
